A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Another Star Wars movie by Disney and once again they make us think the 2nd trilogy by George Lucas was incredibly exceptional compared to this. The duels in particular are as they were written by a 5 yo. New characters presumably weak or unskilled\, can all of sudden do amazing things and close a game that doesn't seem to give half a chance to the bad guys. It has become a business like the one for the Transformers movies\, built for selling more toys and gadgets rather than writing a proper sci-fi movie.
